name: vscode-rpgfree
description: Visual Studio Code extension to convert fixed format RPGLE to free format

vscode-rpgfree.indent.description: Specifies the number of spaces to indent control blocks.

vscode-rpgfree.maximumLineLength.description: Specifies the maximum line length.  When using source physical files, this length should match the length of the SRCDTA column of the source physical file.  Fixed-format RPGLE has a maximum line length of 100.  As such, your RPGLE source physical files should be created with a length of 112 in order to support a SRCDTA length of 100.  If need be, you may lower the defualt maximum line length to 80 to support the IBM default source physical file length; however, this is highly not recommended.  If you are saving source to a stream file, increasing this value to its maximum will ensure that data is not truncated during the conversion to **FREE format.
